title: RIOT PLEASE HELP ( FREE JINX SKIN) ITS A HACK PLZ RIOT THIS NEEDS URGENT ATTENTION !!!!!!!!!!
body:
OKAY WHAT THE FUCK ( sorry for swearing ) but omfg guys what ever you do do not do the free jinx skin its fake its a acc hacking bot me and over 10 my mates were like daum free skin a hour later all 10 of us had our accs hacked icon set to first icon unlocked all our ip and rp used so IM TELLING YOU THE FREE JINX THING ISNT REAL if you like playing lol and like your acc DO NOT put in for the skin my mate lost over 10k rp that he was saving up for new skins with this person needs to be caught and riot plz find out who it is and in total my mates and i have all lost a combined total of 18750 rp i mean the post says its posted BY RIOT KAYLE we all cheacked no body in oce is under that name so RIOT someone is using a hack using a FAKE RIOT name to act liek the post is real  after my first acc got hacked i went onto my second on and got these messages 

**[Chat removed; name & shame + link]**

RIOT IF YOU DONT TAKE THAT PAGE DOWN PEOPLE ARE GONNA START GETTING PISSED OFF ALOT ITS UNDER A FAKE RIOTER NAME ( RIOT KAYLE )
AND THERE USING IT TO STEAL PEOPLE'S ACCOUNTS AND SELL THEM FOR MONEY NOW RIOT YOU HAVE TO READ THIS

replies.body: Can you edit your post to remove the link? Just so more people don't click on it. Change http to hxxp or something so it's not the real link.

so i couldnt log in becuz it said i was logged in somewhere else since i clicked the link about the free jinx and skin giveaway and now i ahd to make a new account im rlly sad all my hard work and skins

when it happened u should of changed your password to league and your email password. Like I did I got my account back within 1 min after I have been signed out. I purchase RP and my account still had my Card on it. So I was devistated. Nothing happened. They didn't make purchases but, All my friends were automaticly sent the like and the click bait message

The same thing happened to my friend a few days ago, same scam. He got his account back today but all the rp had been used up on gifting skins and all the ip gone too. If anyone here fell for the same scam could they let me know the state of the account when they get it back? I want to compare this stuff with what happened to my friend and see if I can find anything out.

hey how many days did he had to wait
i had to make a new account but with the same emailadress

i knew this was fake until i clicked on home and it redirected me to this weird website than i immediately knew that this was a scam and quickly change my password.
Also check who he sended the skin too @i am teemo

Welp i just did it and entered my pass and name ggwp good bye league i did it then searched up what is (link here)

(EDIT)
I changed my password nothing lost but ima work on who sent me the link
Just had this link sent to me.. seemed fake so i googled it and found this post ty!!!!! the person who sent it to me is IMBruceJenner... when i responded saying its fake.. he said i know >.<

I just was on support about this. I got my account within 1min after I purchase RP. It said I have been signed out but I have my account back. But the hack automaticly was sent to all my friends with out me doing it and all of them are hitting the link and are getting scammed too. PLEASE FIX
